chart_description: This chart shows whether there are node configuration-related errors being experienced by the kubelet instance running on a Kubernetes node. This can include errors such as failing to load configuration files or failing to communicate with the API server.

dimension_descriptions.experiencing_error: A boolean dimension that reports whether the node is experiencing a configuration-related error (true) or not (false). If this dimension reports a true value, it could indicate an issue with the Kubernetes node's configuration files or connection to the API server.
